statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m' "$(basename "$cwd")"; branch=$(git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf ' \033[90m%s\033[0m' "$branch"; fi; usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); if [ "$pct" -ge 75 ]; then color='31'; elif [ "$pct" -ge 50 ]; then color='33'; else color='32'; fi; printf ' \033[%sm%d%%\033[0m' "$color" "$pct"; fi
